solution_line_template: First find how much the euros are worth in dollars: {euros} euros * ${euro_to_dollar}/euro = $<<{euros}*{euro_to_dollar}={euro_in_dollars}>>{euro_in_dollars}
Then add that to the amount Jack has in dollars: ${euro_in_dollars} + ${dollars} = $<<{euro_in_dollars}+{dollars}={total_dollars}>>{total_dollars}
